name: hexjumper
text: Teodor is always curiously passive-aggressive.

name: cracklewater
text:
And Onstad is curiously evil in his dealings with the animals.
"I'll make you some clothes out of garbage" is sublime.

The threat of being picked up is weirdly creepy too. It sort of made sense with the cats, but now it's edging towards dom territory. Brrr

name: mr_wilson
text: A comment left by mr_wilson was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by sirhan_duran, divot, littlecat, the_voice, riotdejaneiro, atom, sean1058, sevenarts, GMM, snitchy, rascaldom, dullard, TheLoneliestMonkey, NDCaesar, Endquote, brzbee, JonMW, LordPretzel, behka, ravindra108, lateadopter, clembot, Doc_Rostov, ford, clintisiceman, stoned_lightning, DerSquirrel, whymog, Mastronaut, Milo)

name: ralgnar
text: Uh, read the comic from the day before this one maybe? The one it follows immediately after?

name: luckypyjamas
text: he's going back to bed

name: untilyouaresonude
text: T has really slimmed down over the course of the strip. Sadly, it now gives a quicker line-of-sight to his thunder.

name: doublebatman
text: He took up Parkour dude.

name: hollis
text: How *is* a cranberry hung?

name: killerlimpet
text:
Like a horse.

A sea horse.

name: apocowarg
text: We would have also accepted "A horsefly."

name: foetus_punch
text: Small, white, and bitter.

name: tripperday
text: You mean like a horse...radish?

name: foetus_punch
text:
You mean like a horse...chubby?

No. Nothing like that at all. Quite the opposite.

name: psquid
text: The horseradish I... boned?

name: centipede_damascus
text: What are the boxes in the last panel labeled S and CK for? I cannot stop thinking about it.

name: luckyg
text: CK would be for the cookbook. S could be shirts? You'd think he'd have more shirts than that though.

name: connellingus
text: Stickers, perhaps.

name: bjorntd
text: Small. As in the shirt size.

name: zedpower
text: I'm not too cool with the idea that my book order may have been packed by a naked T�odor.

name: closefriend
text: You should be. From the sound of it, he didn't get his dong on your book. Both would take too long to find.

name: nutmeg
text: just raises the value man that's celebrity dong that got dragged over the cover of your books

name: ferdinand
text: A comment left by ferdinand was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by sirhan_duran, nighttoad, fancypants, godfatherofsouls, ghoti, Boredom_Man, Mastronaut)

name: nutmeg
text:
your mom is nearly impenetrable.

nearly.

name: semiquaver
text: How many people went back after this and chubbied both this comment and nutmeg's before it? Just because?

name: soticoto
text:
Me.
And you get chubbied for pointing it out.

name: semiquaver
text: Yay!

name: soticoto
text:
Just reminding you that I don't hate you.
We cool?

name: invidious
text: Epic win.  That might be the best "your mom" riposte I've ever seen.

name: streever
text: Said the man who doesn't capitalize....

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I like how Onstad refers to his penchant for picking up misbehaving characters. Seems like he's a pretty sour character at 5:30 AM. But then, who isn't?

name: dracer2
text: Is panel 2 the only time we ever see Teodor's teeth?

name: 60teeth
text: no.

name: hateandwar
text: 60teeth never lets us down in tooth related matters. He's clearly an expert. An afficianado.

name: slodowy_slicer
text: also.

name: son_of_selleck
text: oh jeez.... i laughed even harder at this one.... can't wait to use the phrase 'you're hung like a cranberry and it bothers me'

name: deusoma
text: The sheer surreality of Teodor's life makes me smile time and time again.

name: riazm
text: T's penchant for nudity is the small bit of out of character characterisation that makes him realer than most people I meet during the day.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
this is his "little" way

ah hahahaha

name: blarghamagarky
text: Chris Onstad is annoyed with small-hung guys.

name: yingkaixing
text: Aren't you?

name: blarghamagarky
text: Well, yeah.

name: tekende
text: But for completely different reasons, I'd imagine.

name: spinynorman
text: Man, I have no idea why I'm chubbying this but I am.

name: woodenteeth
text: ... because you're a grow-er not a show-er?

name: caseyb3
text:
That's just alt-text. We can't say what Chris Onstad thinks about small-hung guys, canonically.

So when someone is rocking a nasty-ass bike short in skin-hardening-cold Portland weather and he thinks being hung small makes him invisible, and with that goddamn strobing "I belong in traffic" light where it is he just can't fucking look at anything else, and it wouldn't even be so bad if he weren't just chubby enough to push it against the seat so it wobbles with every stroke, almost hypnotic, and Onstad can't even formulate a gag about Teodor obsessing over dick about it because the dick is just so small it wouldn't even do that thing small dicks are supposed to do with the prostate, all it does is sit there and pulsate and make everyone us all look cheap, don't front like you know what his feeling about that asset are.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Philippe: Franky attacked Lyle!

name: gmm
text: Any time Onstad interacts with the charachters, it makes me feel warm and fuzzy.

name: foetus_punch
text: Chris is being a bit of a dick. I am a fairly small hung guy! It's not our fault!

name: deusoma
text: If it makes you feel any better, admitting that took huge balls. Have a chubby.

name: foetus_punch
text: Oh, awesome. Little dick, enormous balls. Just what every girl wants.

name: deusoma
text: Oh wow, I'm the Worst Person in the World. Someone really should invent a pun checker. Have another chubby, with my sincerest apologies.

name: yearsinhotclaws
text: Man, and you got a degree in Comedy?

name: deusoma
text: Alright, you got me. My training allowed me to see that reaction from miles away. I replied that way in the hopes that he would respond the way he did, then I would make what sounded like a sincere apology and rake in hundreds of sympathy chubbies, Muahahahaha! And I would have gotten away with it if it weren't for you meddling kids. Although upon closer inspection, I got exactly one chubby, so that appears to have been the Worst Plan in the World.

name: u235
text:
That, and "I'm going to get bitchy when you want to just take a couple of minutes to get dressed because nobody cares if bears are naked" followed immediately by "I'm going to get bitchy because I care that you're naked".

A bit of a dick? Chris is being a jerk in this strip.

(But to be fair, who among us has never been a jerk?)

name: hrm
text: chris onstad has four toes

name: hrm
text: eight

name: odei
text: Chubby for hilarity!

name: yomimono
text: I didn't think this comment was that great, but it had seven chubbies when I read it, and that just seemed wrong.

name: ragnarok_engine
text: Sixteen!  Thirty two!  My god, someone call the Air Force!

name: chachibenji
text:
No one cares that a bear is naked.
I love that for some reason.

name: professorhazard
text: It's just science.

name: chachibenji
text:
I dont know if there ever was a science to do with no bear peppers.
I dont know very much at all and I dont know that to be sure.

name: direhaggis
text: I think most guys are hung like a cranberry at 6 degrees. And Teodor has wicked sack for not wearing a Starbucks cup. That on top of forced pantlessness is just asking for getting pushed on the head randomly in the future.

name: carlyle
text: I wish the last panel said 'depressed' instead.

name: atypicaloracle
text: It bugs him. Hell, it bugs *me*.

name: hendetta
text: Teodor has problems when it comes to convincing guys to let him wear pants.
